title: Log in - Account Transfer
body: When I logged in a few times ago it gave me an error saying something about account transfer when i havent setup anything of the serts. Is there a way for me to post an event log from the last 6 or 7 attempts?

replies.body:
It sounds like your account may have been compromised and transferred to another region. I'd recommend changing the password for the email address that was associated with your account before reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist you in recovering the account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
i checked purchase history and it doesn't reflect anything. on the topic though. if it is possible to get a hold of our account name can be found, is it possible for the dev team  to implement 2fa?
